text: The records maintained pursuant to § 5-1412, or reproductions thereof certified by the CME, are admissible as evidence in any court in the District; except that, statements made by witnesses or other persons and conclusions upon nonmedical matters are not admissible.
historical:
Prior Codifications

1981 Ed., § 11-2310.

Emergency Act Amendments

For temporary (90 day) addition of section, see § 2914 of the Fiscal Year 2001 Budget Support Congressional Review Emergency Act of 2000 (D.C. Act 13-438, October 20, 2000, 47 DCR 8740).

Legislative History of Laws

For Law 13-172, see notes following § 5-1401.

DC CODE § 5-1413

Current through December 11, 2012

title.text: Police, Firefighters, Medical Examiner, and Forensic Sciences. (Refs & Annos)
